overview: Michael Szabados has served in his current role since April 2007, overseeing all company functions with special focus on integrating the Network General acquisition. Prior to that he served as Senior Vice President, Product Operations for over five years, with responsibility for product development, manufacturing, customer support, human resources and marketing. A veteran of the enterprise networking industry, Mr. Szabados held product and marketing management positions at a number of industry leaders, and has developed a close working relationship with many of the world’s leading IT/network organizations. Prior to NetScout, he served as VP of Product Management at UB Networks (1994-97), Director Product Marketing at SynOptics/Bay Networks (1991-1994), and Marketing Director, Networking at MIPS Corporation (1989-1991). Mr. Szabados holds a BSEE from UC Irvine and an MBA from UC Santa Clara.
